replies.body: I guess people already know me D:
replies.body_tagged: I guess people already know me D:

replies.body:
Kev (^_^) You said in first post Questions? so I responded with "Why?" xD

teehee!!  What is your song you listen to when you are being totally bad ass OP on Nexus?
replies.body_tagged:
Kev (^_^) You said in first post Questions? so I responded with "Why?" xD

replies.body:
Hello, I hope you have fun here at Avicus! (:
Classic AMA questions :3:
1. What's your favorite color and why?
2. If you had one wish to benefit yourself (No donating to charity or anything), what would it be?
3. What do you think the meaning of existence is?
4. Can you easily do 56/24 in your head? (In under 10 seconds)
5. Is your power level over 9000? 
6. If you were a food, what would you be and why?
7. If you were to use a common household object to fight in the zombie appocolypse (Microwave, chair, et cetera), what would it be and why?
8. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why?

replies.body:
I listen to more then one song. I am highly sure Tel misunderstood as he was unaware of the issue I have with my mouse, which I find ok. I'm currently banned.

I won't be seeing you in game soz yaazey. :(

replies.body:
1. I like all colours tbh. Why? Cause it's like a tool kit for me to start filling in my drawings.
2. To benefit myself to have a Good Future.
3. Where oneself has life and a soul. To move, feel, smell, taste and to see. It is where one will notice someone else.
4. 7/3 Just barely xD
5. No it's over Nyan000
6. Rice. Because Asians stick together.
7. My Sword (White covered, white handled and it was something my friend had but I bought it off him).
8. This is a really tough question.

"Are you the Hunter, or the Huntered"

(You can't be Godzilla cause your bones would way to much).
